name: ironist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who uses irony (= the use of words that are the opposite of what you mean, as a way of being funny): He became what he called a liberal ironist, and succeeded in antagonizing both the left and right. The ironists, seeing through everything, make it difficult for anyone to see anything.
More examplesFewer examplesNot even her most fervent admirer would describe her as an ironist.In his columns he merely purveys opinions, which, as an inveterate ironist, he is free to disavow.It would be easy to dismiss him as just another pop ironist, bolting together catchy quotations for the wry amusement of the crowd.
